QuestData.Title: Dah, Nunt... Dah, Nunt...
QuestData.Description: So, seein' as ya been so kind to me, I'm inclined to let you in on a special secret.$b$bI've found the biggest shiney of all, no more than 50 steps from where we're standin'!$b$bOnly one thing stands between you, me, and great fortune - and his name is Gnaws.$b$bDon't fret now - I've got a plan.$b$bGnaws loves his grubs, so I've loaded one up with that gunpowder so as to make like a trap of sorts, ya see?$b$bJust set it floatin' up in the reef. Once the shark is dead, we're rich!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: These waters are far from safe!
QuestData.LogDescription: Budd wants you to use the Booby-Trapped Bait at the Rusty Harpoon Gun in the Skeletal Reef.
QuestData.RewardText: Amazing!$b$bYou watch the great white beast swim off into the depths and wonder to yourself if anything could ever take him down...
